net.parallaxed.bluejam.exceptions
Class RhythmException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              net.parallaxed.bluejam.exceptions.RhythmException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RhythmException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

Thrown when the rhythm of a note fails validation. This most likely occurs if a note is found at the wrong depth in a note tree, or alternatively, the rhythm of the note was not assigned at all.s

Author:
Ciarán Rowe (csr2@kent.ac.uk)
See Also:
Serialized Form

          Constructs the exception with a reference to the note that failed validation.
